location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly to Captain Edwin Dawes, Commanding Berenice

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing four letters to be sent to various recipients:The Superintendent of Telegraph at Mussendom [Musandam]The Officer Commanding ClydeThe Officer Commanding Mail SteamerMr Hubert WaltonThere are letters to all the above recipients on the folios before and after this one, however further details would have been required to determine whether these are the letters referenced above.
